page.title: 07A FRISKNEY PUPIL
page.content:
At about 7.30 I get up, wash, put on my school uniform and have some cereal for my breakfast. At 8.35 I cycle to school with my sister Donna. I go in to my classroom at 8.45. During the morning I have Assembly to sing hymns and pray, have English lessons, have a break and go back in at 10.45 to do my maths. After having a nice hot dinner at 12.00 I go out for another break. I go into school again at 1.05. In the afternoon I have geography, history or science lessons. At 3.05 I leave school with my sister and bike home. I do my homework before having my tea at 5.00. Then I usually watch T.V. for a while or listen to my personal stereo. At 7.00 I have a wash and at 8.00 I eat my supper and then go and snuggle between the bed-sheets at 8.30.
Paula Temple Aged 11
